inputFields.name: gt
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's strictly greater than the one specified

inputFields.name: lt
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's less than the one specified

inputFields.name: gte
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's greater than or equal to than the one specified

inputFields.name: lte
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's less or equal than the one specified

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter records with the specified field defined (i.e. with any value) or not

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for records with an exact match (seconds are truncated)

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude records with an exact match

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for records with an exact match. The specified value must be an Upload ID

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude records with an exact match. The specified value must be an Upload ID

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Filter records that have one of the specified uploads

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Filter records that do not have one of the specified uploads

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter records with the specified field defined (i.e. with any value) or not

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.description: Represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

inputFields.name: ar
inputFields.description:
Aspect Ratio

Specifies an aspect ratio to maintain when resizing and cropping the image

Depends on: `fit=crop`

inputFields.name: auto
inputFields.description:
Automatic

Applies automatic enhancements to images.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/auto)

inputFields.name: bg
inputFields.description:
Background Color

Colors the background of padded and partially-transparent images.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/bg)

inputFields.name: blendAlign
inputFields.description:
Blend Align

Changes the blend alignment relative to the parent image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-align)

inputFields.name: blendAlpha
inputFields.description:
Blend Alpha

Changes the alpha of the blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-alpha)

inputFields.name: blendColor
inputFields.description:
Blend Color

Specifies a color to use when applying the blend.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-color)

inputFields.name: blendCrop
inputFields.description:
Blend Crop

Specifies the type of crop for blend images.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-crop)

inputFields.name: blendFit
inputFields.description:
Blend Fit

Specifies the fit mode for blend images.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-fit)

inputFields.name: blendH
inputFields.description:
Blend Height

Adjusts the height of the blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-h)

inputFields.name: blendMode
inputFields.description:
Blend Mode

Sets the blend mode for a blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-mode)

inputFields.name: blendPad
inputFields.description:
Blend Padding

Applies padding to the blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-pad)

inputFields.name: blendSize
inputFields.description:
Blend Size

Adjusts the size of the blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-size)

inputFields.name: blendW
inputFields.description:
Blend Width

Adjusts the width of the blend image.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-w)

inputFields.name: blendX
inputFields.description:
Blend X Position

Adjusts the x-offset of the blend image relative to its parent.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-x)

inputFields.name: blendY
inputFields.description:
Blend Y Position

Adjusts the y-offset of the blend image relative to its parent.

Depends on: `blend`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend-y)

inputFields.name: blend
inputFields.description:
Blend

Specifies the location of the blend image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/blending/blend)

inputFields.name: blur
inputFields.description:
Gaussian Blur

Applies a gaussian blur to an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/stylize/blur)

inputFields.name: borderBottom
inputFields.description:
Border Bottom

Sets bottom border of an image.

Depends on: `border`

inputFields.name: borderLeft
inputFields.description:
Border Left

Sets left border of an image.

Depends on: `border`

inputFields.name: borderRadiusInner
inputFields.description:
Inner Border Radius

Sets the inner radius of the image's border in pixels.

Depends on: `border`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/border-and-padding/border-radius-inner)

inputFields.name: borderRadius
inputFields.description:
Outer Border Radius

Sets the outer radius of the image's border in pixels.

Depends on: `border`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/border-and-padding/border-radius)

inputFields.name: borderRight
inputFields.description:
Border Right

Sets right border of an image.

Depends on: `border`

inputFields.name: borderTop
inputFields.description:
Border Top

Sets top border of an image.

Depends on: `border`

inputFields.name: border
inputFields.description:
Border Size & Color

Applies a border to an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/border-and-padding/border)

inputFields.name: bri
inputFields.description:
Brightness

Adjusts the brightness of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/bri)

inputFields.name: ch
inputFields.description:
Client Hints

Sets one or more Client-Hints headers

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/ch)

inputFields.name: chromasub
inputFields.description:
Chroma Subsampling

Specifies the output chroma subsampling rate.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/chromasub)

inputFields.name: colorquant
inputFields.description:
Color Quantization

Limits the number of unique colors in an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/colorquant)

inputFields.name: colors
inputFields.description:
Palette Color Count

Specifies how many colors to include in a palette-extraction response.

Depends on: `palette`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/color-palette/colors)

inputFields.name: con
inputFields.description:
Contrast

Adjusts the contrast of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/con)

inputFields.name: cornerRadius
inputFields.description:
Mask Corner Radius

Specifies the radius value for a rounded corner mask.

Depends on: `mask=corners`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/mask/corner-radius)

inputFields.name: crop
inputFields.description:
Crop Mode

Specifies how to crop an image.

Depends on: `fit=crop`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/size/crop)

inputFields.name: cs
inputFields.description:
Color Space

Specifies the color space of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/cs)

inputFields.name: dl
inputFields.description:
Download

Forces a URL to use send-file in its response.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/dl)

inputFields.name: dpi
inputFields.description:
Dots Per Inch

Sets the DPI value in the EXIF header.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/dpi)

inputFields.name: dpr
inputFields.description:
Device Pixel Ratio

Adjusts the device-pixel ratio of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/dpr)

inputFields.name: duotoneAlpha
inputFields.description:
Duotone Alpha

Changes the alpha of the duotone effect atop the source image.

Depends on: `duotone`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/stylize/duotone-alpha)

inputFields.name: duotone
inputFields.description:
Duotone

Applies a duotone effect to the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/stylize/duotone)

inputFields.name: exp
inputFields.description:
Exposure

Adjusts the exposure of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/exp)

inputFields.name: expires
inputFields.description:
Url Expiration Timestamp

A Unix timestamp specifying a UTC time. Requests made to this URL after that time will output a 404 status code.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/expires)

inputFields.name: faceindex
inputFields.description:
Face Index

Selects a face to crop to.

Depends on: `fit=facearea`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/face-detection/faceindex)

inputFields.name: facepad
inputFields.description:
Face Padding

Adjusts padding around a selected face.

Depends on: `fit=facearea`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/face-detection/facepad)

inputFields.name: faces
inputFields.description:
Json Face Data

Specifies that face data should be included in output when combined with `fm=json`.

Depends on: `fm=json`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/face-detection/faces)

inputFields.name: fillColor
inputFields.description:
Fill Color

Sets the fill color for images with additional space created by the fit setting

Depends on: `fill=solid`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/fill/fill-color)

inputFields.name: fill
inputFields.description:
Fill Mode

Determines how to fill in additional space created by the fit setting

Depends on: `fit`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/fill/fill)

inputFields.name: fit
inputFields.description:
Resize Fit Mode

Specifies how to map the source image to the output image dimensions.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/size/fit)

inputFields.name: flip
inputFields.description:
Flip Axis

Flips an image on a specified axis.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/rotation/flip)

inputFields.name: fm
inputFields.description:
Output Format

Changes the format of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/fm)

inputFields.name: fpDebug
inputFields.description:
Focal Point Debug

Displays crosshairs identifying the location of the set focal point

Depends on: `fit=crop`, `crop=focalpoint`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/focalpoint-crop/fp-debug)

inputFields.name: fpX
inputFields.description:
Focal Point X Position

Sets the relative horizontal value for the focal point of an image

Depends on: `fit=crop`, `crop=focalpoint`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/focalpoint-crop/fp-x)

inputFields.name: fpY
inputFields.description:
Focal Point Y Position

Sets the relative vertical value for the focal point of an image

Depends on: `fit=crop`, `crop=focalpoint`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/focalpoint-crop/fp-y)

inputFields.name: fpZ
inputFields.description:
Focal Point Zoom

Sets the relative zoom value for the focal point of an image

Depends on: `fit=crop`, `crop=focalpoint`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/focalpoint-crop/fp-z)

inputFields.name: gam
inputFields.description:
Gamma

Adjusts the gamma of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/gam)

inputFields.name: gridColors
inputFields.description:
Grid Colors

Sets grid colors for the transparency checkerboard grid.

Depends on: `transparency`

inputFields.name: gridSize
inputFields.description:
Grid Size

Sets grid size for the transparency checkerboard grid.

Depends on: `transparency`

inputFields.name: h
inputFields.description:
Image Height

Adjusts the height of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/size/h)

inputFields.name: high
inputFields.description:
Highlight

Adjusts the highlights of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/high)

inputFields.name: htn
inputFields.description:
Halftone

Applies a half-tone effect to the source image.

inputFields.name: hue
inputFields.description:
Hue Shift

Adjusts the hue of the source image.

inputFields.name: invert
inputFields.description:
Invert

Inverts the colors on the source image.

Output Quality

Adjusts the quality of an output image.

Depends on: `fm=jpg`, `fm=pjpg`, `fm=webp`, `fm=jxr`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/format/q)

inputFields.name: rect
inputFields.description:
Source Rectangle Region

Crops an image to a specified rectangle.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/size/rect)

inputFields.name: rot
inputFields.description:
Rotation

Rotates an image by a specified number of degrees.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/rotation/rot)

inputFields.name: sat
inputFields.description:
Saturation

Adjusts the saturation of an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/sat)

inputFields.name: sepia
inputFields.description:
Sepia Tone

Applies a sepia effect to an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/stylize/sepia)

inputFields.name: shad
inputFields.description:
Shadow

Adjusts the highlights of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/shad)

inputFields.name: sharp
inputFields.description:
Sharpen

Adjusts the sharpness of the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/sharp)

inputFields.name: transparency
inputFields.description:
Transparency

Adds checkerboard behind images which support transparency.

inputFields.name: trimColor
inputFields.description:
Trim Color

Specifies a trim color on a trim operation.

Depends on: `trim=color`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim-color)

inputFields.name: trimMd
inputFields.description:
Trim Mean Difference

Specifies the mean difference on a trim operation.

Depends on: `trim=auto`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim-md)

inputFields.name: trimPad
inputFields.description:
Trim Padding

Pads the area of the source image before trimming.

Depends on: `trim`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim-pad)

inputFields.name: trimSd
inputFields.description:
Trim Standard Deviation

Specifies the standard deviation on a trim operation.

Depends on: `trim=auto`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim-sd)

inputFields.name: trimTol
inputFields.description:
Trim Tolerance

Specifies the tolerance on a trim operation.

Depends on: `trim=color`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim-tol)

inputFields.name: trim
inputFields.description:
Trim Image

Trims the source image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/trim/trim)

inputFields.name: txtAlign
inputFields.description:
Text Align

Sets the vertical and horizontal alignment of rendered text relative to the base image.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-align)

inputFields.name: txtClip
inputFields.description:
Text Clipping Mode

Sets the clipping properties of rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-clip)

inputFields.name: txtColor
inputFields.description:
Text Color

Specifies the color of rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-color)

inputFields.name: txtFit
inputFields.description:
Text Fit Mode

Specifies the fit approach for rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-fit)

inputFields.name: txtFont
inputFields.description:
Text Font

Selects a font for rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-font)

inputFields.name: txtLead
inputFields.description:
Text Leading

Sets the leading (line spacing) for rendered text. Only works on the multi-line text endpoint.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/typesetting/txt-lead)

inputFields.name: txtLig
inputFields.description:
Text Ligatures

Controls the level of ligature substitution

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-lig)

inputFields.name: txtLineColor
inputFields.description:
Text Outline Color

Specifies a text outline color.

Depends on: `txt`, `txtline`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-line-color)

inputFields.name: txtLine
inputFields.description:
Text Outline

Outlines the rendered text with a specified color.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-line)

inputFields.name: txtPad
inputFields.description:
Text Padding

Specifies the padding (in device-independent pixels) between a textbox and the edges of the base image.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-pad)

inputFields.name: txtShad
inputFields.description:
Text Shadow

Applies a shadow to rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-shad)

inputFields.name: txtSize
inputFields.description:
Text Font Size

Sets the font size of rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-size)

inputFields.name: txtTrack
inputFields.description:
Text Tracking

Sets the tracking (letter spacing) for rendered text. Only works on the multi-line text endpoint.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/typesetting/txt-track)

inputFields.name: txtWidth
inputFields.description:
Text Width

Sets the width of rendered text.

Depends on: `txt`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt-width)

inputFields.name: txt
inputFields.description:
Text String

Sets the text string to render.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/text/txt)

inputFields.name: usm
inputFields.description:
Unsharp Mask

Sharpens the source image using an unsharp mask.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/usm)

inputFields.name: usmrad
inputFields.description:
Unsharp Mask Radius

Specifies the radius for an unsharp mask operation.

Depends on: `usm`

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/usmrad)

inputFields.name: vib
inputFields.description:
Vibrance

Adjusts the vibrance of an image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/adjustment/vib)

inputFields.name: w
inputFields.description:
Image Width

Adjusts the width of the output image.

[Open Imgix reference »](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/url/size/w)

types.name: InUseFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by usage

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search uploads that are currently used by some record or not

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: IntType
types.description: Represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: ItemIdFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by ID

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search the record with the specified ID

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude the record with the specified ID

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Search records with the specified IDs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Search records that do not have the specified IDs

types.name: JsonFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter JSON fields

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter records with the specified field defined (i.e. with any value) or not

types.name: LinksFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter Multiple-links fields

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for records with an exact match. The specified values must be Record IDs

inputFields.name: allIn
inputFields.description: Filter records linked to all of the specified records. The specified values must be Record IDs

inputFields.name: anyIn
inputFields.description: Filter records linked to at least one of the specified records. The specified values must be Record IDs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Filter records not linked to any of the specified records. The specified values must be Record IDs

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter records with the specified field defined (i.e. with any value) or not

types.name: MemberRecord
types.description: Record of type Member (member)

args.name: locale
args.description: The locale to use to fetch the field's content

types.name: OrientationFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by image orientation

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search uploads with the specified orientation

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude uploads with the specified orientation

types.name: ParentFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by parent (tree-like collections only)

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Filter records children of the specified record. Value must be a Record ID

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter records with a parent record or not

types.name: PositionFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by position (sorted and tree-like collections)

inputFields.name: gt
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's strictly greater than the one specified

inputFields.name: lt
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's less than the one specified

inputFields.name: gte
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's greater than or equal to the one specified

inputFields.name: lte
inputFields.description: Filter records with a value that's less or equal than the one specified

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for records with an exact match

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude records with an exact match

types.name: UploadTagsFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by tags

inputFields.name: contains
inputFields.description: Filter uploads linked to the specified tag

inputFields.name: allIn
inputFields.description: Filter uploads linked to all of the specified tags

inputFields.name: anyIn
inputFields.description: Filter uploads linked to at least one of the specified tags

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Filter uploads not linked to any of the specified tags

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for uploads with an exact match

types.name: UploadTitleFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by default title

inputFields.name: matches
inputFields.description: Filter uploads based on a regular expression

inputFields.name: notMatches
inputFields.description: Exclude uploads based on a regular expression

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search the asset with the specified title

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude the asset with the specified title

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Search assets with the specified as default title

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Search assets that do not have the specified as default title

inputFields.name: exists
inputFields.description: Filter assets with the specified field defined (i.e. with any value) or not

types.name: UploadUpdatedAtFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by update datetime

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search for uploads with an exact match

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Exclude uploads with an exact match

inputFields.name: lt
inputFields.description: Filter uploads with a value that's less than the one specified

inputFields.name: lte
inputFields.description: Filter uploads with a value that's less or equal than the one specified

inputFields.name: gt
inputFields.description: Filter uploads with a value that's strictly greater than the one specified

inputFields.name: gte
inputFields.description: Filter uploads with a value that's greater than or equal to the one specified

args.name: res
args.description: Pick highest resolution available up to the specified argument

args.name: exactRes
args.description: Pick the exact resolution quality specified in the argument

args.name: format
args.description: The file extension of the requested image format. Either png, jpg or gif

types.name: UploadWidthFilter
types.description: Specifies how to filter by width

inputFields.name: gt
inputFields.description: Search all assets larger than the specified width

inputFields.name: lt
inputFields.description: Search all assets smaller than the specified width

inputFields.name: gte
inputFields.description: Search all assets larger or equal to the specified width

inputFields.name: lte
inputFields.description: Search all assets larger or equal to the specified width

inputFields.name: eq
inputFields.description: Search assets with the specified width

inputFields.name: neq
inputFields.description: Search assets that do not have the specified width

types.name: VideoRecord
types.description: Record of type Video (video)

args.name: locale
args.description: The locale to use to fetch the field's content

types.name: ViewMoreLinkRecord
types.description: Record of type View More Link (view_more_link)

args.name: locale
args.description: The locale to use to fetch the field's content

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByUrl`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
